outline:
1. occupation, work, business
    1. occupation, business
    2. property
    3. work (something done or made)
    4. workmanship
    5. service, use
    6. public business
      1. political
      2. religious
kjv_def: business, [phrase] cattle, [phrase] industrious, occupation, ([phrase] -pied), [phrase] officer, thing (made), use, (manner of) work((-man), -manship).
strongs_def: properly, deputyship, i.e. ministry; generally, employment (never servile) or work (abstractly or concretely); also property (as the result of labor)
